original_title: Bandstrasse - Diese spontane Arbeitsniederlegung war nicht geplant
overview: Documentary about one of the most significant migrant battles in the Federal Republic of Germany, a wildcat strike mainly sustained by migrant workers (euphemistically called “guest workers”) at the Ford plant in Cologne-Niehl in August 1973.
title: Bandstrasse - Diese spontane Arbeitsniederlegung war nicht geplant
